objects.text: 9 Hours Cooling Retention | Energy Efficient | Sapphire Blue

product_details.name: Whirlpool 184 L 2 Star Direct-Cool Single Door Refrigerator (205 WDE CLS 2S SAPPHIRE BLUE-Z, Blue,2023 Model)
product_details.description: Brand: Whirlpool. Model: 205 WDE CLS 2S. Capacity: 184 litres. Annual Energy Consumption: 190 Kilowatt Hours Per Year. Refrigerator Fresh Food Capacity: 169.2 litres. Freezer Capacity: 14.3 Litres. Bottle Count: 4. Installation Type: Freestanding. Part Number: 205 WDE CLS 2S. Form Factor: Stand Alone. Special Features: Adjustable Shelves. Colour: SAPPHIRE BLUE-Z. Voltage: 220. Wattage: 205 Watts. Number of Drawers: 4. Defrost System: Automatic. Door Orientation: Left. Door Material: Stainless Steel. Shelf Type: Wire. Number of Shelves: 2. Certification: Energy Rating. Material: Stainless Steel. Batteries Required: No. Country of Origin: India. Importer: Whirlpool of India Ltd. Plot No. A-4, MIDC Ranjangaon,Taluka Shirur, Dist: Pune, Maharashtra 412220, India, Email - helpdeskindia@whirlpool.com ; Toll Free - 1800 208 1800. Item Weight: 33 kg 400 g. Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 60.5 x 53.5 x 118.8 Centimeters. Net Quantity: 1 count. Generic Name: Refrigerator.

banner_details:
The banner features a modern, technology-themed design for a refrigerator product. The background uses a diagonal blue gradient with subtle radial lighting and geometric snowflake illustrations, giving a cool and techy aesthetic. At the top center, a bold header (id: "heading") catches attention in white, followed by a subheading (id: "subheading") in soft lavender referencing the product category. The center is dominated by the refrigerator image (id: "product_image"), placed over a glowing circular highlight. A key feature is visually emphasized here with an embedded snowflake icon and text overlay. Below, supporting details (id: "description") in white reinforce the product's value. The pricing (id: "price") is highlighted in a warm peach tone, followed by a strong call-to-action button (id: "cta") with blue text on a white button background (id: "cta_background").

**Color Palette:**  
- Royal Blue: `#1a237e`  
- Indigo Gradient: `#303f9f`  
- White: `#FFFFFF`  
- Light Lavender: `#e0e0ff`  
- Accent Peach: `#FFBF7F`
product_color: The product image showcases a refrigerator with a sleek and bold gradient finish that transitions from deep navy blue to a softer violet-gray on the edges. The primary color is a rich indigo (#0D1B5C), which instantly conveys a sense of coolness and reliability. This is complemented by a soft lavender-gray (#BDB9D8) on the rounded edges, creating a smooth gradient blend. White (#FFFFFF) is used strategically for the snowflake graphic, text, and logo, ensuring high visibility and contrast. These colors together create a refined and minimalistic aesthetic, perfect for advertising banners that aim to emphasize efficiency and modern elegance.
